title: Spinneys becomes first UAE retailer to transition to recycled plastic packaging, in partnership with Al Bayader International - ZAWYA
summary: Spinneys, a leading fresh food retailer in the UAE, has partnered with Al Bayader International to introduce recycled plastic packaging (rPET) for its 'SpinneysFOOD' private label range. This initiative aims to reduce environmental impact by using significantly less water, energy, and fossil fuels compared to traditional packaging while diverting plastic waste from landfills. Spinneys projects a reduction of six metric tonnes of CO2 emissions annually through this new packaging, which includes a traceability system to enhance customer confidence. The partnership aligns with sustainable development goals and the UAE's Circular Economy Vision.
green_innovation: TRUE, because the initiative introduces recycled packaging that significantly reduces environmental impact by conserving resources and lowering CO2 emissions.
business_innovation: TRUE, because Spinneys is introducing a new and improved packaging solution that differs significantly from its previous products, exemplifying business innovation.
green_product: TRUE, because the rPET packaging is designed to minimize environmental impact and is made from recycled materials, thus fitting the definition of a green product.
green_process: TRUE, because the method of using recycled plastics to create new packaging minimizes waste and promotes sustainability in the packaging process.
